Enigma Machine
--------------

![Enigma Machine](/image/enigma-patent.png)

Invented by [Arthur Scherbius](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Arthur_Scherbius) attacked by [Polish Cipher Bureau](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biuro_Szyfr%C3%B3w)
